details:
Bluetooth: L2CAP: fix use-after-free in l2cap_conn_del()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.299 by commit 17c6164854f8bb80bf76f32b2c2f199c16b53703, it was introduced in version v4.14.291 by commit 5bb395334392891dffae5a0e8f37dbe1d70496c9. For more details please see the references link.
summary: Bluetooth: L2CAP: fix use-after-free in l2cap_conn_del()
